stories.text:
My goal is to develop a system like Scribble. So what would be your sequence of 3 books to get me there?

I don't know any Lisp, but I'm a mid level haskeller.
stories.title: Ask HN: Books to learn scheme so that I can hack scribble?

stories.text:
There are numerous Remote software engineering job boards.

But there are engineers out there interested in returning to the office ASAP, at least a couple of days a week (whether because they're more productive there, miss the in-person interaction, prefer colleagues in the same time zone, etc).

Anyone familiar with job search resources for them?

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: Job boards for onsite (non-remote) tech jobs?
